summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Specifies the MPEG audio encoding mode. This enumeration is used with the AVEncMPACodingMode property.

member.name: eAVEncMPACodingMode.eAVEncMPACodingMode_Mono
member.summary: Single channel. This mode corresponds to single_channel mode (bit code '11'), defined in ISO/IEC 11172-3.

member.name: eAVEncMPACodingMode.eAVEncMPACodingMode_Stereo
member.summary: Stereo channels. This mode corresponds to stereo mode ('00'), defined in ISO/IEC 11172-3.

member.name: eAVEncMPACodingMode.eAVEncMPACodingMode_DualChannel
member.summary: Two mono channels. This mode corresponds to dual_channel mode ('10'), defined in ISO/IEC 11172-3.

member.name: eAVEncMPACodingMode.eAVEncMPACodingMode_JointStereo
member.summary: Joint stereo mode. This mode uses similarities between the two channels to achieve greater compression. This mode corresponds to joint_stereo mode ('01'), defined in ISO/IEC 11172-3.

member.name: eAVEncMPACodingMode.eAVEncMPACodingMode_Surround
member.summary: Surround audio (5.1 channels). This mode applies to MPEG-2 audio (ISO/IEC 13818-3).
